titles.title: A bill to require the Administrator of Federal Aviation Administration to establish a pilot program to provide flight training services to veterans.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
American Aviator Act
This bill requires the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) to provide grants to certain pilot schools for flight training services to veterans.
The FAA must give priority to pilot schools that (1) are accredited by the Department of Education, or (2) hold a restricted airline transport pilot letter of authorization.
